title: Chocolate fondant with salted caramel brittle and caramel sauce
description: Push the boat out with this truly indulgent dessert of melt-in-the-middle chocolate puddings teamed with salted caramel. Equipment and preparation: You will need four 7x6cm/2¾x2½in or 100ml/3½fl oz dariole moulds.
ingredients: ½ tsp fleur de sel (or sea salt)
½ tsp fleur de sel (or sea salt)
